name: Drive and park the stretcher - the hospital emergency nurse game - Free Edition
name_original: Drive and park the stretcher - the hospital emergency nurse game - Free Edition
description:
TRY DRIVE AND PARK THE STRETCHER

Play this unusual game with funny characters. The game is specially designed for game lovers. Park the stretcher before time runs out.

Reach the goal of parking the stretcher in time and more score points. The challenge for the players is to park the stretcher in the hospital in the given time. Drive the stretcher form starting point and reach the finish line within allotted time. Don’t hit your stretcher as you are carrying your patient to hospital. Be quick and alert. The game is imbued with fun. It`s an arcade game that serves sheer entertainment. Play this game with your friends to beat their score. Download this game today itself to beat the time and enjoy this fun loving game.

DOWNLOAD TODAY>>> TRY DRIVE AND PARK THE STRETCHER
